istanbul-lib-meterReading
===================

[![Greenkeeper badge](https://badges.greenkeeper.io/istanbuljs/istanbul-lib-meterReading.svg)](https://greenkeeper.io/)

Core reporting utilities for istanbul. Docs to follow.
